site_name: Open Land Rear Of 1-51 Peckham High Street Bounded By Sumner Avenue And Melon RoadOpen Land Adjacent To 59 Peckham High Street And Sumner House Located On Sumner RoadLondon
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of condition 12 (Approved document M building regulations) pursuant to planning application ref. no. 16/AP/4018: Redevelopment of the site to provide four buildings to deliver 168 residential dwellings (Class C3) and flexible retail floor space (247m2) of flexible A1/A3/A4: The works include the conversion and extension of Sumner House (Block A) from office use (Class B1-c) to provide 44 no flats and 4 no townhouses and partial demolition of a boundary wall;  the erection of a part 4, part 6 storey block to provide 39 no flats on Sumner Avenue (Block B);  a part four, part 6 storey building to provide 72 no. flats on Jocelyn Street (Block C);  and a four storey block providing 9 flats on Melon Road  (Block D), with 247m2 of flexible A1/A3/A4 use at ground floor level, together with car parking, hard and soft landscaping,  and other associated works incidental to the development.
